20110118141032.500|20110118141035.000|TR0|staff. The cash bonanza comes
20110118141035.000|20110118141037.000|TR0|after many banks were bailed out
20110118141037.000|20110118141039.000|TR0|by taxpayer's money AND amid

20110118141045.000|20110118141047.500|TR0|
20110118141047.500|20110118141050.000|TR0|London loc for the whole PKG
20110118141050.000|20110118141052.500|TR0|This is austerity Britain - the

20110118141105.000|20110118141107.500|TR0|rules. Prime minister David

20110118141717.500|20110118141720.000|TR0|Church siege in October that
